title: Ep. 644 - Extortion By The Teachers Unions
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, teachers unions are demanding to be put to the front of the vaccine line in order to resume classes. But now that they’ve gotten the vaccine, they’re still refusing to go back to work. Also Five Headlines including the Biden Administration announcing that the military will pay for sex change operations again. This is supposed to be a win for diversity. And in our Daily Cancellation, some on the Left are complaining that Tom Brady still has a job in the NFL but Colin Kaepernick doesn’t, which is a little bit like complaining that Kevin Durant has a job in the NBA but I don’t. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
